extends FandomPage

    Author:
    Mika Thein

    Fandom

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public FandomArticle build()
        Loads images, sections and languages.

        This method is only necessary if DO_NOT_BUILD has been chosen as build option.

        Returns:
        this FandomArticle
        See Also:
        BUILD, DO_NOT_BUILD, FandomArticle(long, Fandom, int), getImages(), getSections(), getLanguages()

      • getImages

        public java.lang.String[] getImages()
        Returns all image names.

        Warning: Might return null if build() has not been executed and DO_NOT_BUILD has been chosen as build option.

        Returns:
        all image names
        See Also:
        getImage(int), getSections(), getLanguages()
